name: Void (itch) (NikhilNeo7030)
description:
In-Game You play as a light capsule which is stuck in the void of darkness and we need to guide it through it using our instincts and attentiveness of environment
the player can move around using given control in order to find spatial gatway, doing so the player has several options to find it with given clues
I highly recommend to use proper stereo headphones, earphones for best experience and to get know the game better
